1 received your suggestions for a meeting at Columbia, Missouri,
and 1 think this would be fine. 1 have changed my mind several
times as to whether or not 1 would attend the Conference, but
if there is a possibility of meeting with you and Gertrude and then
going on to Austin to talk with Earl, I will definitely plan to attend.
1 think this whole thing will hinge on how quickly Torkelson can apÂ¬
prove the sub-contract.
1 have requested reservations at the Tiger Hotel and I plan to arrive
either late Sunday, March 1st or the morning of Tuesday, March 2nd.
Let me know you and Gertrude's plans and I'll adjust mine to suit
the conference. 1 will hold off making any reservations for Austin,
Texas until I hear further from you.
Sincerely,
General Manager
CRT/mw
Dr. Clair R. Tettemer
General Manager
